Ivica Olic (Wolfsburg) finds the space inside the box to meet a cross, but his header from near the penalty spot low towards the left post is saved by the goalkeeper.

Goal! Marcel Schafer launched the corner kick and superbly found the head of Naldo (Wolfsburg), whose accurate effort from near the penalty spot went straight into the left side of the goal. It's 1:0.
A cross is whipped into the box by Daniel Caligiuri (Wolfsburg) and Ivica Olic controls it well. He lines up the ball, but one of the defenders produces a timely intervention.

Loris Karius doesn't have to worry about this one. Daniel Caligiuri plays a pass into the feet of Ivan Perisic (Wolfsburg), who is unable to find the target as his effort from inside the box goes high over the bar.

Sami Allagui (Mainz) latches on to a precise pass and finds himself one-on-one with the keeper. He fires a low shot towards the right side of the net, but Diego Benaglio leaps like a salmon to deny him.

The referee blows his whistle for half-time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.

A yellow card for a tackle by Johannes Geis (Mainz). Guido Winkmann doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

Loris Karius pulls off a great save to deny Kevin De Bruyne (Wolfsburg), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive to the bottom right corner. Nice individual effort by Ivica Olic (Wolfsburg). He gets all the way through to the keeper and hits a shot to the left side of the goal, but Loris Karius does a good job to anticipate the direction of the ball and keeps it out. The ball is out of play. Wolfsburg will have a chance to score from a corner.

That was a nice football moment. Kevin De Bruyne (Wolfsburg) receives an amazing defence-splitting low pass on the edge of the box and blasts the ball towards the bottom left corner. Loris Karius guesses his intention and dives superbly to deny him with a remarkable save! It will be a corner kick for Wolfsburg.

Kevin De Bruyne (Wolfsburg) gets to the rebound outside the box and doesn't hesitate to shoot on goal. It was a promising attempt, but one of the defending players got in the way and blocked it. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Wolfsburg.

Substitution. Ivan Perisic makes his way off the pitch and Maximilian Arnold (Wolfsburg) comes on as his replacement.

Maximilian Arnold (Wolfsburg) receives a precise low pass inside the box, controls the ball and drills it to the middle of the goal, but Loris Karius makes a comfortable save to stop his effort. Yellow card! It's like Omer Toprak (Bayer Leverkusen) was asking for a caution with his behaviour. Manuel Grafe agrees and books him.

Manuel Grafe shows a yellow card to Marco Hoger (Schalke) for his blatant foul. Stefan Reinartz (Bayer Leverkusen) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.

Stefan Kiessling (Bayer Leverkusen) wastes a great chance from the resulting corner. He times his header superbly when he leaps high to meet a precise cross, but can't aim better than low towards the middle of the goal, straight into the arms of the goalkeeper.
